section.name: 3. Quick Start
section.p: This chapter explains in short what steps are required to write a Cayenne application, and then presents a few tutorials showing examples of various applications. Each of the tutorials provides a simple SQL script to create the tables and data needed.
section.panel: Source code for the tutorials discussed in this chapter is bundled with Cayenne distribution. More advanced Cayenne examples are available as a separate download from the download page.
